welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bredbury, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its quaint streets and friendly locals. Get ready to explore, experience, and fall in love with all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used by low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used by domestic and European airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per device.
